ygData.subject: Re: Screaming Mace Question
ygData.msgSnippet: well, it is a fairly decent weapon...i think the dmg is 6 tho.....but other than that, it s a nice weapon, and you ll want a magical weapon when you start
ygData.messageBody:
well, it is a fairly decent weapon...i think the dmg is 6 tho.....but other than
that, it's a nice weapon, and you'll want a magical weapon when you start going
to dungeons like unrest and the like....and the yaulp on the mace does help in
soloing....at least imho it does...but keep in mind that your spells are also
very helpful....(: just my 2cp worth

(\/)ystix

Chris Wheeler wrote:

> From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
> Hi,
>
> I am considering buying a Screaming Mace. Right now I have a BloodForge
> Hammer, whic does great dmg, but is slow and heavy. I also find I am
> soloing less, so I want a 1H that I can use my SBS with.
>
> My current 1H blunt is a FS Mace, which has 8dmg, and rougly the same dly as
> the Screaming Mace. Its wt is 10.
>
> Other than the magical effects, is there any advantage to buying one? Or
> should I save my money?
>
> Brytewing, lvl 16 halfling cleric.
>
>
